# Introductory

* MATH 315: Applied Statistical Methods I (Robin Donatello, Edward Roualdes, Kathy Gray)
* MATH 385 / CSCI 385: Introduction to Data Science (Robin Donatello, Essia Hamouda)
* JOUR 310: Data Journalism ()


# Advanced

* MATH 456: Applied Statistical Methods II (Robin Donatello, Kathy Gray)
* MATH 485 / CSCI 485: Advanced Data Science (Coming Spring 18) (Robin Donatello, Essia Hamouda)
